resources.string: Sent via Dasmic Battery Saver app

This app with automatically stop all running apps and will disable WiFi and Bluetooth saving battery power in your device. With this app you can also view installed apps by size, installed date, updated date etc. You can also check the security permissions of each app in your device including those pre-installed by Google and device manufacturer.\n\nThrough this app you can send the installed app to friends via message ,email or cloud and they can then install it on their devices. This app also generates a detailed report on each app installed in your device.
